title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs and mix with cheese.
Combine spaghetti with pancetta and egg mixture off the heat.
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala spice mix for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through.
